catalog_script_client.name: Populate Point of Contact

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Interdivision Work Order(N461)">4488cd9a1b4a6c90f5659605bc4bcba3</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate Point of Contact</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  
	var uAjax = new GlideAjax('x_g_ni4_interdivis.Interdivision_help');

	uAjax.addParam('sysparm_name','getUser');
	
	uAjax.addParam('sysparm_name_userid', g_user.userID);
	uAjax.getXML(setUserInfo);
    
    function setUserInfo(response){
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
       		answer = JSON.parse(answer);
		 if(answer.unit){
//alert('ou');
		    g_form.setValue('customer_ou', answer.unit);
}
		if(answer.division){
//alert('division');
		    g_form.setValue('customer_division', answer.division);
}
	

}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jnz1202</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-03 14:21:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>10d895ea1bceec90f5659605bc4bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Point of Contact</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Interdivision Work Order" source="x_g_ni4_interdivis">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Interdivision Work Order">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_10d895ea1bceec90f5659605bc4bcbda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jnz1202</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-03 14:21:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
